1.text: Freeze your lemon before thawing and heating it.

2.text: Put a whole lemon in the microwave for 10-20 seconds.

3.text: Soak the lemon in a bowl of warm water for 30-40 minutes.
3.vid: /1/1a/Get More Juice out of a Lemon Step 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Roll the lemon around before cutting it to loosen the juices.
4.vid: /f/f8/Get More Juice out of a Lemon Step 4.360p.mp4

5.text: Wash your lemon and set it out on a cutting board.

6.text: Cut the lemon lengthwise in half through the center for a clean cut.
6.vid: /0/0d/Get More Juice out of a Lemon Step 6.360p.mp4

7.text: Peel the lemon over a strainer to extract the juice.
7.vid: /5/5c/Get More Juice out of a Lemon Step 7.360p.mp4

8.text: Squeeze the lemon hard while holding it over a large bowl.
8.vid: /8/80/Get More Juice out of a Lemon Step 8.360p.mp4

9.text: Use the tines of a fork to poke the membrane before squeezing again.
9.vid: /a/aa/Get More Juice out of a Lemon Step 9.360p.mp4

10.text: Use a hand juicer to extract the juice cleanly.
10.vid: /0/0d/Get More Juice out of a Lemon Step 10.360p.mp4
